podcasts.title: AI Frontiers
podcasts.description: Exploring the latest developments in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and their real-world applications

episodes.title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence (Short Intro)
episodes.description: Introduction to AI: what it is, why it matters, and its transformative potential

episodes.title: History and Evolution of AI
episodes.description: Trace the origins of AI, from symbolic AI to machine learning and neural networks

episodes.title: Machine Learning: The Foundation of Modern AI
episodes.description: Define machine learning and its core idea of learning from data rather than explicit programming

episodes.title: Neural Networks: The Basics
episodes.description: Explain how neural networks mimic the human brain using nodes, weights, and layers

episodes.title: Deep Learning and Advanced Architectures
episodes.description: Explore the leap from simple neural networks to deep learning

episodes.title: Transformer Architecture
episodes.description: Dive into the mechanics of transformers: self-attention, positional encoding, and sequence processing

episodes.title: Large Language Models (LLMs)
episodes.description: Define LLMs and explain their role in natural language processing

episodes.title: Pretraining, Fine-Tuning, and Optimization
episodes.description: Pretraining: How LLMs are trained on diverse datasets to learn language patterns

episodes.title: Limitations and Bias in AI Systems
episodes.description: Examine ethical and technical limitations, such as bias in training data and potential misuse

episodes.title: Applications and Future of AI
episodes.description: Real-world applications in chatbots, healthcare, creative industries, and more

podcasts.title: Blockchain Decoded
podcasts.description: Understanding blockchain technology, cryptocurrencies, and their impact on the future of finance

episodes.title: Blockchain Basics
episodes.description: Understanding the fundamentals of blockchain technology

episodes.title: Smart Contracts Deep Dive
episodes.description: Exploring the power of automated blockchain contracts

episodes.title: DeFi Revolution
episodes.description: The rise of decentralized finance

episodes.title: NFTs Explained
episodes.description: Understanding non-fungible tokens and digital ownership

episodes.title: Cryptocurrency Mining
episodes.description: How crypto mining works and its environmental impact

episodes.title: Blockchain Security
episodes.description: Security measures and best practices in blockchain

episodes.title: Enterprise Blockchain
episodes.description: How businesses are adopting blockchain technology

episodes.title: Blockchain Scalability
episodes.description: Addressing the challenges of blockchain growth

episodes.title: Cross-Chain Integration
episodes.description: Understanding blockchain interoperability

episodes.title: Future of Blockchain
episodes.description: Emerging trends and future applications

podcasts.title: ICP Insights
podcasts.description: Diving deep into the Internet Computer Protocol and its revolutionary approach to cloud computing

episodes.title: What is the Internet Computer?
episodes.description: Introduction to ICP and its core concepts

episodes.title: DFINITY Foundation
episodes.description: The organization behind the Internet Computer

episodes.title: ICP Tokenomics
episodes.description: Understanding the ICP token ecosystem

episodes.title: Building on ICP
episodes.description: Developer tools and resources for ICP

episodes.title: ICP Network Architecture
episodes.description: Technical deep dive into ICP's infrastructure

episodes.title: ICP Smart Contracts
episodes.description: Understanding canisters and smart contracts on ICP

episodes.title: ICP Governance
episodes.description: How decisions are made in the ICP ecosystem

episodes.title: DApps on ICP
episodes.description: Exploring decentralized applications on Internet Computer

episodes.title: ICP Security Features
episodes.description: Security mechanisms and protocols in ICP

episodes.title: ICP's Vision
episodes.description: The future of Internet Computer and web3
